titles.title: False Travel Documents Prohibition Act of 2006
A bill to amend section 1028 of title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the possession, transfer, or use of fraudulent travel documents.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 4/24/2006--Introduced. False Travel Documents Prohibition Act of 2006 - Amends the federal criminal code to prohibit the production, transfer, possession, and use of false travel documents.
